title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Expt. No.Titles of Experiments1Principles of metallographic sample preparation and observation.2Solidification of metals and alloys, and determination of phase diagrams.3Observation of macrostructures.4Work hardening and recrystallization annealing of metals and alloys.5Study of different types of eutectic microstructures.6Heat treatment of different plain carbon steels, and their microstructures and hardness.7Microstructures of some commercially available non-ferrous alloys.8Microstructures, compositions and hardness of different components used in a bicycle.
page: MT29007: Introduction To Engineering Materials Lab.
